thread.title: Spacious room with a nice view close to a New York hotspot
thread.title_full: Spacious room with a nice view close to a New York hotspot - Review of World Center Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Oliver H
title: Spacious room with a nice view close to a New York hotspot
text:
The World Center offers nice rooms with a view on the pools and the WTC. The rooms are perfectly suited even for a longer stay on a business trip.
Prices can be quite reasonable, depending on the time you travel. The service is very friendly and helpful.
Definitely a good place for the next business trip to NY, not a luxury hotel, but a nice place to stay.
